name: Save Kill them all
description:
Saving and killing them is a simple adventure shooting game.
Game Story:
As a special forces soldier, the military order you receive is to clear all monsters on the island. You don't have any teammates! You need to collect guns as soon as possible! Kill them with limited bullets!(Although many monsters do not attack you, your task is to kill them all.)
Content and playback
-Players operate characters to fight against enemies
-All kinds of guns
-Explore broad maps
Game features:
-The first person is really exciting.
-Players need to collect guns to fight enemies.
-Find the enemies on the island and kill them.
